meanings.definition: The quality or state of being snub or curt in manner or speech.
meanings.sent1: Her snubbinesses towards others made them feel unwelcome.
meanings.sent2: The snubbinesses of the receptionist turned away potential customers.
meanings.sent3: Despite her snubbinesses, she still managed to make friends.
meanings.sent4: The snubbinesses of the cold wind made everyone shiver.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's snubbinesses in class made the students afraid to ask questions.

meanings.definition: Instances of being treated with disdain or indifference.
meanings.sent1: He felt hurt by the snubbinesses he experienced at the party.
meanings.sent2: The snubbinesses from his colleagues made him consider finding a new job.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed snubbinesses towards the new toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The snubbinesses of the old building towards modern architecture was evident.
meanings.sent5: The snubbinesses of the rainy weather ruined the picnic plans.
